dmca.title: Hello Kitty Says "Hello, Take Down" [Blogger]
dmca.body:
Notice of Infringement: www.blogger.com
User: Sweat Shop by tiq

We are intellectual property counsel to Sanrio Company, Ltd. and Sanrio, Inc. ("Sanrio"). This notice reports a infringement of our client's intellectual property in compliance with the Digital Millenium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17 U.S.C. 512(c), regarding content on the above-referenced website, which is apparently hosted by your company. See www.copyright.gov/onlinesp/.

Sanrio's Intellectual Property
Sanrio owns the famous HELLO KITTY and many other characters. See, e.g., www.sanrio.com. The names and images of Sanrio Characters are protected by numerous U.S. copyright and trademark registrations, including, e.g., U.S. Copyright Registration Nox. VAu 684-322, VA 1-296-115, and VA 1-303-874.

Infringing Material

www.blogger.com, through its user "Sweat Shop by tiq." is displaying and offering for sale unauthorized HELLO KITTY items, namely, corsets. See http://sweatshopbytiq.blogspot.com/ (enclosures by FedEx).

Statement of Good Faith

I hereby represent that Sanrio has a good faith belief that the display and offer for sale of the above-referenced items in their present form is not authorized by Sanrio, its agents, or the law.

Demand for Removal

On behalf of our client Sanrio, we hereby demand that all depictions of HELLO KITTY items, including without limitation those referenced above, be immediately removed from www.blogger.com.

Contact Information

Your response to this notice should be addressed to my attention at the address, phone number and/or email printed above.

Statement of Accuracy

Under penalty of perjury, the information in this notice is accurate and as counsel for Sanrio we are authorized to act on behalf of Sanrio in this matter.

This notice is submitted without prejudice to our client's rights, all of which are hereby reserved. We look forward to your prompt attention to this matter. Thank you.

Sincerely,

OWEN, WICKERSHAM & ERICKSON, P.C.

By [Private]
dmca.principal_name: Sanrio Company, Ltd. and Sanrio, Inc.
